newsitem.title: LATVIA: SAULES OFFERS NEW CREDIT CARD PHONE SERVICES.
newsitem.headline: SAULES OFFERS NEW CREDIT CARD PHONE SERVICES.

text.p: Saules Bank said on Monday that holders of its Eurocards and Mastercards now have two new services, to use the telephone using your credit card and to have information on how much credit is left via the telephone.
It said the telephone service was available in more than 80 countries.

Saules said in a statement that clients must call to a computer, gives the number of the card, the secret code number and the country code and the telephone number. It said international calls were cheaper under this system.
The second service allows customers to call the bank, give the account number and the final four numbers of the card to get the amount of credit left on the card.
